DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : TECHNOLOGY & TELECOMMUNICATIONS
DOC.TEXT: FCC Sets Date for Phone Auction : Federal regulators said they will auction the first batch of licenses in December for a new phone_service providing a single number for home , work or anywhere else.Ninety-nine licenses will be put_on the block beginning Dec . 5 , the Federal Communications Commission said . The announcement dispelled concern among some potential bidders that the auction could end_up being put_off until early next year . The licenses , which will allow companies to provide a mobile telephone_service that is supposed to be cheaper and more mobile than existing cellular service , will cover 51 geographic_areas , including Los Angeles-San Diego .
